resources.string: "Upload the product (pre-owned) which you want to sell"
"Click on this button to find the product you are looking for. "
"Click on this button to post an advertisement for a Home Business being run by your spouse, siblings, parents, relatives or friends and help them with an extended and elite market. "
Choose this option for selling a car or property. You can find a ready buyer directly within your office or other offices and get rid of the hassles of contacting any wheeler-dealer or agent.
Choose this option for uploading any item other than property and car for selling. Once uploaded, colleagues from your office or other offices shall contact you directly.
Choose this option if you want colleagues from your office only to contact you for purchasing your uploaded product.
Choose this option if you want colleagues from your office as well as offices within near vicinity shall contact you for purchasing the uploaded product.

Choose this option if you want that colleagues from all those corporates within your city (corporates which are a registered member of this site) shall be able to contact you for purchasing your product.

string.name: stringname
string.u: Post your ad in response to this requirement
